title: Peru
description: In December 2008, my family went on a National Geographic Expedition that led us on a week of hiking to Machu Picchu.

photos.description: A bird. I'm not that excited about birds specifically, but I like animal photography and they just tend to be what you see the most of.
photos.alt: A bird flying above a mountain in a cloudy sky.

photos.description: Salkantay. I like the framing with the valley.
photos.alt: A snow-covered mountain in the distance in the valley between green hills.

photos.description: I think Salktantay again from the other side, but maybe it's some other mountain.
photos.alt: A snow-covered mountain in the distance behind a green field.
A colorful rooster with spiky feathers on its head.

photos.description: A spectacled bear eating watermelon/staring pensively. I think this was some sort of nature preserve. There's a fence in the extreme foreground, but I mostly managed to hide it in this shot.
photos.alt: A bear leaning forward over a watermelon that it's holding in its paws.

photos.description: Machu Picchu from the spot where everyone photographs it.
photos.alt: A high view of a grassy, tiered, ancient city made of stone.
Alpaca grazing on a tiered grassy hill.
A dense and bright city on a grassy hill.
